short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed test extension using sample image download time and image size

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple one click extension to get the current download speed. Users can access it from the extension bay and there is a test button in the ui popup. Users can click on that test button to get the instant download speed, clicking on the button again will show the current download speed. Its very easy and convenient to use.
